summary: Smart Grama Sustainability Platform - A full-stack government-style digital platform connecting citizens and Panchayat for sustainable development. Features include complaint reporting with photo/audio/geo-location, tree plantation tracking, rainwater harvesting requests, solar scheme applications, role-based authentication (Citizen/Admin), admin dashboard with analytics, map integration, and sustainability metrics tracking.
architectural_notes: Full-stack MERN architecture: React.js (Vite/Next.js) frontend with Tailwind CSS, Node.js/Express backend, MongoDB/Firebase database
JWT authentication with bcrypt password hashing and role-based access control (Citizen/Admin)
Google Maps API integration for geo-location and marker visualization
RESTful API architecture with protected routes and middleware
Real-time updates using Socket.io for notifications
Mobile-first responsive design with government theme (white/saffron/green)
Environment variables: MONGO_URI, JWT_SECRET, CLOUDINARY_KEYS, GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication system with two roles (Citizen and Admin) supporting registration, login, and JWT-based session management with role-based access control

Create Complaint Reporting Module allowing citizens to submit complaints with name, mobile, category (Garbage, Street Light, Drainage, Others), description, photo upload, audio upload, auto geo-location capture, and status tracking

Build admin complaint management interface allowing Panchayat admins to view all submissions, filter by category, update status (Pending to In Progress to Completed), assign worker names, and upload completion proof photos
Implement citizen complaint rating system allowing users to rate completed work after admin marks complaint as completed
Create Tree Plantation Module allowing citizens to request saplings, select tree type (Neem, Mango, etc.), upload planting photo, and geo-tag location
Build admin tree plantation management allowing admins to approve requests, mark trees as planted, update survival tracking status, and view survival rate analytics
Implement Rainwater Harvesting (Inkudu Gunta) Module allowing citizens to request implementation with house details and land photo upload
Create admin rainwater harvesting management allowing admins to assign 100-days workers, track completion, mark water capacity, and add groundwater impact analytics
Build Solar Scheme Application Module integrated with Pradhan Mantri Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana, allowing citizens to upload Aadhaar, electricity bill, house photo, and submit applications
Implement admin solar scheme management allowing admins to verify documents, update installation status, and track renewable energy generated with CO₂ reduction estimates

Create comprehensive Admin Analytics Dashboard displaying total complaints, completion percentage, tree survival rate, solar installations count, rainwater projects count, with bar chart, pie chart, monthly activity line chart, map with markers, and recent activity feed
Integrate Google Maps displaying complaints as red markers, trees as green markers, solar homes as yellow markers, with filter by category functionality and popup details on marker click

Design government-style UI with header displaying India emblem style logo and village name, navbar with Home, Report Issue, Tree, Water, Solar, My Requests, Admin Login links, language toggle for English and Telugu, status badges with color coding, and clean white, saffron, and green theme that is fully mobile responsive
Implement My Requests page for citizens showing all their submitted complaints, tree requests, rainwater requests, and solar applications with status tracking
Create Government Schemes Information Page displaying all India government schemes with clickable scheme cards that navigate to detailed information pages showing full scheme details
Add footer section with Panchayat office address, contact number, government disclaimer, and links to Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, and About Smart Grama pages
